title: DVAM 2025 Kickoff Webinar
description: Join our virtual event to kick off Domestic Violence Awareness Month. Learn new outreach strategies and campaign ideas.

title: Legal Advocacy Training
description: A live webinar for advocates and attorneys on Texas protective orders, new laws, and survivor-centered support.

title: Prevention Educator Roundtable
description: Share best practices and connect with peers working in youth prevention and education.
